ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Talendor
ygData.msgSnippet: Once we had a nagafen raid go bad and he was without visible health when everyone died, so a wizard who had bound outside his lair ran back in with IC loaded
ygData.messageBody:
Once we had a nagafen raid go bad and he was without visible health when
everyone died, so a wizard who had bound outside his lair ran back in
with IC loaded and got the solo kill in one blast. He soon after typed
/surname Dragonslayer.

Shada/Erisi

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 6:08 AM
To: Eqbards (E-mail)
Subject: [eqbards] Talendor


Have you all heard the story of the ranger that got the solo kill on
Talendor? :)

Heh...it was the darndest thing. Was a near wipeout when he went into
run
mode, and all that was left to beat on him was the ranger, Dreadmere.
